contentfulPagePressRelease.title: DIFI Event: Towards a Better Work-Family Balance in GCC Countries

childMarkdownRemark.html:
The Doha International Family Institute (DIFI) is organizing a seminar entitled ‘Towards a Better Work-Family Balance in GCC Countries’ on 30 March 2015 in Doha.






The overall objective of the Seminar is to highlight the importance of balancing work and family responsibilities in GCC countries, and to study the different ramifications of the lack of such balance on the family, institutions, state and community.

The Seminar will address regional and international best practices in this regard and how to use them in GCC countries.

The forum will be conducted in Arabic.

To read the full article on DIFI’s website, please click here.
